name: Rigo: The Movie (itch)
description:
In this game, you will follow the events of the titular character, as he navigates through seemingly mundane events, in a world that is anything but normal.

This game was made in collaboration with several artists and musicians, showcasing the creative talent  of everyone. In a sense it is a celebration of art itself.

As this is only the demo, anything in the game is subject to change as more feedback comes in, so that the game will continue to improve.
